useFixedRadius.description: If true the visual will take the max Radius in px, else it is a dynamic factor

scaleFactor.description: Overlap of data at half radius (1 = exactly no overlap)

innerOffset.description: Offset in Pixels from the center of the circle to the data maximum

colors.description: Use the colors specified here to fill groups?

showLines.description: Show a line between the groups

minPointRadius.description: Minimum radius for data points in px

clamp.description: Limit data points out of range to range limits

angleOffSet.description: Offset in degrees for where to start the first item

cornerRadius.description: Corner radius for the segments in pixels

steps.description: Number of steps the data should be clustered in (number of circles)

stepMode.description: Mode for the data steps to be shown

clamp.description: Limit data points out of range to range limits
